snippet.title: Count Pumpcula Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an exciting 2D-metroidvania journey through the Eastern Archipelago of Lanthir Range! Along the way you’ll need to save the Sagelings from a dark curse in the forest of Orn, fight prehistoric creatures that were thought to be extinct, escape the beasts that lie within the Isle of Orod, and slide through the icy catacombs of Krakens Pass. In your down time, relax with charming new companions on the enchanting Island of Travellers Cove.

Support on KickStarter :
Wishlist on Steam:

And play the Demo on Steam.
